name: Telemega
description:
No downloadable version yet! But it runs well on Mozilla Firefox and Chrome!

A or D to move left or right, 

No jumping allowed yo! So don't you try ;)

Instead try teleporting by clicking somewhere, then pressing spacebar to teleport to that location! Pretty simple... or is it. 

There is a catch. You can only teleport if you have points to spare. To get more collect the floating cubes. Can you beat my high score of 81? psh.. doubt it. 

Thanks for the support none the less, and enjoy the game! Feel free to donate a buck or two so I can buy more red bulls and diapers for my babies and myself. Red bulls for my babies, diapers for me. Game dev requires no bathroom breaks. :)

-AJ
